amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase Research and University Research Centers funding by $9.4 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding (by offsets) for Research and University Research Centers by $9,448,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Israel amendment Failed by recorded vote: 197 - 228 (Roll no. 265).
